lead_paragraph: An article Saturday about Steven, Mark and Diana Lopez, siblings who qualified for the Olympics in tae kwon do, misstated the origins of karate. It is a Japanese martial art, not a Korean martial art like tae kwon do.
snippet: An article Saturday about Steven, Mark and Diana Lopez, siblings who qualified for the Olympics in tae kwon do, misstated the origins of karate. It is a Japanese martial art, not a Korean martial art like tae kwon do.
